A4.text: Steinem was a columnist for New York magazine and a co‑founder of Ms. magazine.

A5.text: Also in 1971, she co‑founded the Women’s Action Alliance which, until 1997, provided support to a network of feminist activists and worked to advance feminist causes and legislation.

A6.text: Gloria Steinem founded Ms. magazine with Dorothy Pitman Hughes.
